sentences.sContent: President Lee says the economic benefits of that agreement were uppermost in his mind when he made the beef deal.
sentences.sContent_eng: President Lee says the economic benefits of that agreement were uppermost in his mind when he made the beef deal.
sentences.sCn: 李明博说，他决定这项自由贸易协议时，该协议的经济利益在他心中是最重要的。

sentences.sContent: Use its names for the uppermost classes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Use its names for the uppermost classes.
sentences.sCn: 将其名称用于最高级的类。

synos.tran: 至上的；最高的；最主要的
最高地；最重要地；最突出地

remMethod.val: upper(较高的) + most(最) → 最高的
